content.text: Your AI Team for One Person Business ‚Äî 91 Professional AI Skills Empowering Solo Entrepreneurs
becomes possible. A single person can accomplish tasks that previously required an entire team with the help of AI.
However, general-purpose AI assistants often lack deep professional knowledge and cannot work as efficiently as real experts.

solves this problem ‚Äî it's a collection of professional Skills designed for Claude Code, where each Skill is a "virtual expert" equipped with domain-specific knowledge, workflows, and best practices.
Enable solo entrepreneurs to have their own "virtual expert team" covering all aspects of business operations including product, R&D, design, marketing, operations, finance, and legal.
Each Skill comes with built-in domain expertise, methodologies, and templates ‚Äî not generic responses
Provides structured processes from input to output
Based on Claude Code Skill mechanism, ready to use after installation
Iteratively improved based on actual usage, accumulating best practices

# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/chendongqi/OPB-Skills.git

# Link skills directory to Claude Code global config
ln -s /path/to/OPB-Skills/skills ~/.claude/skills
